title: BitLocker key
extract: BitLocker uses an AES encryption algorithm with a 128-bit key or 256-bit key to encrypt disk volumes. It protects the data when a hard drive is stolen and is being used on another computer or when someone has physical access to the drive.
extract_html: BitLocker uses an AES encryption algorithm with a 128-bit key or 256-bit key to encrypt disk volumes. It protects the data when a hard drive is stolen and is being used on another computer or when someone has physical access to the drive.
